The claim that Kenya: s Amina Mohamed is the new WTO boss is being circulated on social media, particularly in Nigeria, through various posts and tweets.
However: it is clarified that Mohamed is one of the candidates in the race for the WTO director-general position, along with Nigeria's Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala and several other contenders from different countries.
The appointment process for the new WTO: general is still ongoing, with consultations with WTO members to narrow down the field of candidates before the final selection is made.
